description: This file defines a React component page for displaying decision details within a Next.js application. It includes functions for static path generation and a component that fetches decision data based on route parameters.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters for Next.js static export, returning a stub set of decision IDs for static site generation.

methods.name: DecisionDetailPage
methods.description: Asynchronous React component that retrieves the decision ID from route parameters and renders decision details with page header.
